review: Loving it so far. A lot of replayability.

Really fun!The game makes you (snake) feel like a professional.Pros:- good graphics and runs very smooth (I have a gtx760 and I play smoothly on max on 1080p)- excellent mechanics- loadout system is pretty cool- ai is actually pretty smart- lot of intricaciesCons:- a very minor con: the camera system feels slightly sluggish, but it could just be meMy rating 9.5/10!
